title: Welcome
content: Welcome to OpenIndiana Reimagined, a new look on the classic 'no-frills' OpenIndiana website, hope you enjoy. Visit GitHub!!
author: OpenIndiana Team

title: Docs have a new look
content: I have made a new documentation site, that is experimental, included features are: W3C compatibility, and a modern fun look. Check it out.
author: Ribhav Revalli
